positive_examples: This is an example of chemical weapon production facility.
The chemical weapon production facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed chemical weapon production facility in this context.
A typical case of chemical weapon production facility would involve these features.
The concept of chemical weapon production facility applies here.
A facility designed for the manufacture and production of chemical weapons and toxic agents.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon production facility, not chemical weapon production facility.
This represents w m d weapons production facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponProductionFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsProductionFacility

definition: A facility manufacturing chemical agents intended for use as weapons.
